title: CryptoKaZee
author: CryptoKaZee
content: Why did cryptocurrency break up with its girlfriend?Because every time they had a little FUD, it couldn't HODL its emotions and sold off in a panic! Talk about commitment issues in the blockchain dating scene. ðŸ˜„ðŸ’” #CryptoHeartbreaks

comments.body: What is an irish investor afraid of?Forking bitcoin!

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: Quote from: btc78 on November 26, 2023, 11:47:22 PMWhat is an irish investor afraid of?Forking bitcoin! I rarely ever laugh out loud at text jokes but yours almost made me spit my drink out.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.created_time: November 27, 2023, 06:24:39 PMLast edit: November 27, 2023, 06:37:15 PM by Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoKaZee on November 26, 2023, 02:50:05 PMWhy did cryptocurrency break up with its girlfriend?I think why Crypto currency break up with his girlfriend is because of her character. She doesn't stays one place. today she will visit bearish and tomorrow she goes to bullrun. making the relationship not stable. And now Crypto currency is looking towards USTD as a wife material because of it's stability. but consedring bitcoin as the best because of it ability to grow in knowledge and understanding as days passes by.Ladies can lie! Emagine a lady telling her friends, that she met a rich guy that spray her bitcoin in a party last night. and guest what? The bitcoin is still in her bag. Probably expecting to use it to buy groceries in shop the next morning. One of my dude told me that we always talks about bullrun. That where is the bull running to? I replied, running to ATH. He asked again what is ATH? I said all time high. He replied is there anytime one can be all time high? I said yes, the highest time of drinking alcohol.
